room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Jail" by Real Escape Room in San Francisco
review: Tried the Escape from Jail scenario. Their small jail room escape was the best i've tried yet! It comes complete with an enthusiastic and convincing actor and has many many levels of puzzles intertwined!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Jail" by Real Escape Room in San Francisco
review: Real Escape Game on Polk was so fun! I was suprised such a small space could hold such a great game. I have been to the one in San Jose before as well. Came here with a group of friends and we all had a blast. I don't want to give any details away but we all had a great time and want to do another one some time soon!The jail one was a great storyline, and the employees were helpful at times and very committed to staying in character.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Jail" by Real Escape Room in San Francisco
review: Had an awesome time escaping from the jail. This was my first escape room experience and I cannot stop talking about it. Went with a group of friends and was amazed at how much fun I had. The game was challenging and exciting and just a ton of fun to work through with friends. Would highly recommend it to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Jail" by Real Escape Room in San Francisco
review: So my friends and I did Escape the Jail last week, and as fun as the puzzles were, I have to give major kudos to the woman who played our guard. She was spot on, and we keep coming back to here as our favorite element in the entire thing. Props, and thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from the Jail" by Real Escape Room in San Francisco
review: I went back to SCRAP and did their latest escape room - Escape from the Jail recently. We didn't manage to escape unfortunately, but we all really enjoyed ourselves and loved how they incorporated the theme into the game mechanics.
